entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Discount Information

In-App Purchases

Application Description

Whisk is a lightweight HTML and PHP editor with a live preview that updates as you type. *** Whisk‚Äôs free download includes 14-day fully functional trial and document viewer mode. An In-App Purchases is available to unlock the full edition, with discounts for previous owners. *** Whisk is an essential app in your toolkit for HTML, PHP, CSS, and Javascript programming. It is great for learning web development, testing snippets of code, or building entire web pages. Whisk‚Äôs integrated preview pane displays the web page live as you type. Whisk breaks the tedious cycle of writing HTML, saving the file, then reloading and viewing the page in the browser. Combining the writing phase with the viewing phase clarifies the effects of your changes and speeds up the overall process of making a web page. W3C-based validation will red-underline any mistakes. It uses the same rendering engine found in Safari, so it is not only standards compliant, but also very fast. =================== Whisk is the app previously known as HyperEdit! For a comprehensive list of what‚Äôs new, visit: https://tumult.com/whisk/whats-new/2.6/ Macworld rating (Nov 2004): 4.5 mice =================== Use Whisk For: ‚Ä¢ Crafting HTML to make sure it looks exactly as you want it ‚Ä¢ Testing and executing PHP code ‚Ä¢ Writing blog posts, forum entries, or rich emails ‚Ä¢ Interactively trying out CSS ‚Ä¢ Running and debugging JavaScript ‚Ä¢ And creating whole websites Main Features: ‚Ä¢ Preview pane quickly renders HTML and PHP as typed, using the same engine as Safari ‚Ä¢ Watched Files automatically (or manually) determine when files are changed and will reload the web preview (file access permissions required) ‚Ä¢ Live HTML W3C-based validation shows errors and highlights problem tags with a red underline ‚Ä¢ Preview to other browsers or the Hype Reflect app on iOS ‚Ä¢ Web inspector/console/dev tools access ‚Ä¢ Customizable syntax highlighting coloring ‚Ä¢ Reusable code snippets and color swatches ‚Ä¢ Scroll sync keeps can keep the editor and preview at similar spots ‚Ä¢ View HTML source code generated by the PHP engine ‚Ä¢ Attach Style Sheets for viewing how blog posts/markup will look with external styling Because We Love the Mac: ‚Ä¢ Written in Cocoa exclusively as a macOS app (supports 10.12 through macOS 14 Sonoma) ‚Ä¢ Adopts new macOS features and is gorgeous in Light and Dark modes ‚Ä¢ It runs natively as a Universal app on Intel and Apple Silicon Macs =================== Download Whisk now and start your free trial! Documentation is available on Whisk‚Äôs website.

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BetterTouchTool LicenseÔºö$17.99 ‚Üí $12.99 [$12.99 ~ $17.99]

Application Description

BetterSnapTool allows you to easily manage your window positions and sizes by either dragging them to one of the screen's corners or to the top, left or right side of the screen. This enables you to easily maximize your windows, position them side by side or even resize them to quarters of the screen. If you need even more than those standard snap areas, BetterSnapTool now allows you to create your own, custom snap areas anywhere on your display. These can resize & move windows to any possible position. More features included are: ‚Ä¢ support for multiple monitors ‚Ä¢ customizable keyboard shortcuts to trigger any snap area ‚Ä¢ lots of design customization options ‚Ä¢ always accessible pop up menu showing all possible snap sizes / positions ‚Ä¢ move or resize the window below the cursor while holding customizable modifier keys. ‚Ä¢ select what happens when double-clicking a window's titlebar ‚Ä¢ select what happens when right-clicking any of the red/orange/green window buttons of any window BetterSnapTool is very customizable and will change the way you work with your Mac! BetterSnapTool works with almost every application, only some apps with non-standard windows can't be supported.

Meitu is the simplest image processing tool that can quickly achieve professional-level photo editing effects. AI tools are constantly updated, and everyone can make good pictures! === AI image modification, intelligent design without effort === [AI Cutout] Efficient in all categories, 3s background removal, one-click change of background color/local pictures [AI Remover] One-click removal of redundant text, passers-by, skin acne spots, complex backgrounds, etc., without leaving any traces! [AI Enhancer] Ultra-clear image quality rebirth, say goodbye to poor image quality [AI Background Change] Enter keywords, AI generates product and portrait scene pictures [AI Expand] Freely expand the picture frame, intelligently fill the picture, and the composition does not need to be cropped! [AI Smart Selection] Any element can be freely moved, scaled, copied, redrawn, eliminated, and adjusted in color... ===Meitu Batch Editor, efficient and higher quality=== Import hundreds of pictures at a time, batch cut out pictures to change backgrounds, make them clear, add watermarks, crop and change sizes, compress and convert formats, etc., without repeated operations, efficient and refined! ===Poster design, change pictures and words with one click=== Massive high-quality templates cover e-commerce, administrative office, new media, WeChat and many other scenarios. ===Puzzle splicing, creative layout=== Seamless, horizontal and vertical, four-grid, nine-grid, love, triangle and many other puzzle styles, you can also freely assemble, social more colorful! ===Basic picture editing, simple and outstanding=== [Add text] [Crop, rotate, correct, and adjust size] [Dimming, color adjustment, and filter][Border stickers] [Brush] ===Medical-grade portrait beauty, high-definition natural face=== [One-click beauty and whitening] [Facial reshaping] [Face slimming, body slimming, height increase] [Eye and Teeth Refinement] ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî [Meitu computer version SVIP automatic renewal service statement] [Meitu computer SVIP rights] Experience massive materials, personalized functions, and more refreshing without ads. For example, continuous monthly subscription products are 20 yuan per month; continuous seasonal subscription products are 50 yuan per quarter; continuous annual subscription products are 168 yuan per year. [Payment] After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be charged to the iTunes account. [Renewal] "Continuous monthly/quarterly/yearly" products are auto-renewable products, and your iTunes account will be charged after confirming the purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription. Within 24 hours before your subscription period expires, Apple will automatically deduct the fee from your iTunes account, and the membership validity period will be automatically extended by one period after success. [Cancel renewal] If you want to cancel the automatic renewal, please manually go to "Settings" on your iPhone - click "Apple ID", select to enter the "Subscription" page, and select "Meitu SVIP" to cancel the subscription. [Free Trial] Renew the subscription during the free trial period to cancel the renewal, and the free trial rights will not be recovered from the user, and the user can try it until the trial period ends. ==Related Agreement== Membership Service Agreement: https://pc.meitu.com/agreement Privacy Policy Address: https://pc.meitu.com/legal-agreement?type=pc

entry.title: Meitu-AI Photo Editor & Design
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly Auto-renew Meitu SVIPÔºö$12.49 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $12.49]

Application Description

Meitu is the simplest image processing tool that can quickly achieve professional-level photo editing effects. AI tools are constantly updated, and everyone can make good pictures! === AI image modification, intelligent design without effort === [AI Cutout] Efficient in all categories, 3s background removal, one-click change of background color/local pictures [AI Remover] One-click removal of redundant text, passers-by, skin acne spots, complex backgrounds, etc., without leaving any traces! [AI Enhancer] Ultra-clear image quality rebirth, say goodbye to poor image quality [AI Background Change] Enter keywords, AI generates product and portrait scene pictures [AI Expand] Freely expand the picture frame, intelligently fill the picture, and the composition does not need to be cropped! [AI Smart Selection] Any element can be freely moved, scaled, copied, redrawn, eliminated, and adjusted in color... ===Meitu Batch Editor, efficient and higher quality=== Import hundreds of pictures at a time, batch cut out pictures to change backgrounds, make them clear, add watermarks, crop and change sizes, compress and convert formats, etc., without repeated operations, efficient and refined! ===Poster design, change pictures and words with one click=== Massive high-quality templates cover e-commerce, administrative office, new media, WeChat and many other scenarios. ===Puzzle splicing, creative layout=== Seamless, horizontal and vertical, four-grid, nine-grid, love, triangle and many other puzzle styles, you can also freely assemble, social more colorful! ===Basic picture editing, simple and outstanding=== [Add text] [Crop, rotate, correct, and adjust size] [Dimming, color adjustment, and filter][Border stickers] [Brush] ===Medical-grade portrait beauty, high-definition natural face=== [One-click beauty and whitening] [Facial reshaping] [Face slimming, body slimming, height increase] [Eye and Teeth Refinement] ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî [Meitu computer version SVIP automatic renewal service statement] [Meitu computer SVIP rights] Experience massive materials, personalized functions, and more refreshing without ads. [Subscription period] Meitu Computer SVIP - Continuous Monthly Subscription: Subscription period of 1 month Meitu PC SVIP - Continuous Season: Subscription period of 3 months Meitu PC SVIP - Consecutive Yearly Subscription: Subscription period of 12 months [Subscription price] The iAP application information shall prevail. For example, continuous monthly subscription products are 20 yuan per month; continuous seasonal subscription products are 50 yuan per quarter; continuous annual subscription products are 168 yuan per year. [Payment] After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be charged to the iTunes account. [Renewal] "Continuous monthly/quarterly/yearly" products are auto-renewable products, and your iTunes account will be charged after confirming the purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription. Within 24 hours before your subscription period expires, Apple will automatically deduct the fee from your iTunes account, and the membership validity period will be automatically extended by one period after success. [Cancel renewal] If you want to cancel the automatic renewal, please manually go to "Settings" on your iPhone - click "Apple ID", select to enter the "Subscription" page, and select "Meitu SVIP" to cancel the subscription. [Free Trial] Renew the subscription during the free trial period to cancel the renewal, and the free trial rights will not be recovered from the user, and the user can try it until the trial period ends. ==Related Agreement== Membership Service Agreement: https://pc.meitu.com/agreement Privacy Policy Address: https://pc.meitu.com/legal-agreement?type=pc

entry.title: The Audio Converter
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium PassÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $19.99]

Application Description

Quickly convert your audio or video files to nearly any audio format! 1. Select your input file 2. Choose your output format ( MP3, WAV, M4A, AAC etc. ) 3. Convert! It will only take a few seconds. 4. Done! Listen right away, or open in your favorite app Here are the video and audio output formats you can choose from: MP3, M4A, AAC, FLAC, OGG, WAV, WMA, AIFF You can convert from dozens of input formats, here are some of the most popular formats we support converting from: MOV, M4A, MP3, WMA, MP4, WAV, OGG, OPUS, AMR, AAC, WEBM, MID and many more! Save, Share or Listen to your converted audio files in your favorite apps immediately. Conversion is done on a secure cloud server, which makes conversion easier, faster and much more battery-friendly. You must have an internet connection to use this app. Files are immediately deleted from the server after conversion. While the files are immediately deleted after conversion or cancellation, you should be aware that by using this app, you agree that your files will be sent over to internet from the app to the conversion server. We've also recently added support for local conversions for many popular conversion types. These conversions don't require a server, and are usually done almost instantly! We are continuing to add support for more local conversions with each update. This app includes an optional auto-renewable subscription (Premium Pass): Premium Pass beings with a free trial period, then an auto-renewable monthly subscription when trial ends. Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration/price selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hrs before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Apple Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the free initial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. entry.content:
Discount Information

Application Description

#1 Hi-Res audio player for Mac & iPhone. Music just sounds better! *NEW* Introducing VOX Premium ‚Äì Your Ultimate Music Experience. VOX Premium adds a stunning cloud streaming features and unlimited music storage without a decline in quality. Sync, stream and cache your entire music library on Mac and iPhone in a way that suits you best! Listen to your music regardless of the format: ‚Ä¢ Play numerous lossy and lossless (FLAC, APE, WAV, DSD, etc.) audio formats; ‚Ä¢ Export playlists in various formats (PLS, M3U, XSPF); ‚Ä¢ Open different playlist types including M3U, PLS, XSPF, and the popular CUE format used to store CD rips; ‚Ä¢ Play audio files stored on NAS devices and other network drives. Manage your music easily:¬† ‚Ä¢ Control the player from the main interface, Dock context menu or main menu controls; ‚Ä¢ Automatically search for all the missing album artwork from MusicBrainz and Last.fm databases; ‚Ä¢ Use keyboard media keys, headphones controls, and Apple Remote to control the playback (requires VOX Preference Pane); ‚Ä¢ Easily add music via smart drop zones, open dialog and Finder context menu; ‚Ä¢ Use the Equalizer with presets & custom mode, crossfade, fade on play/pause, converting music to 5.1 or 7.1 format; ‚Ä¢ Preview album artwork from your Dock icon; ‚Ä¢ Gapless playback support; ‚Ä¢ Get system or Growl playback notifications. Focus on music, not the source:¬† ‚Ä¢ Work with different audio sources including custom Playlists, iTunes Library, online radio and much more; ‚Ä¢ Scrobble to Last.fm to keep your listening stats up-to-date; ‚Ä¢ Play any song, any playlist you find on YouTube via VOX FLAC Player, put all your YouTube songs into one media collection. Full SoundCloud integration: ‚Ä¢ Easily control SoundCloud via VOX; ‚Ä¢ Access the largest music database in the world and discover new tunes; ‚Ä¢ Bring your SoundCloud stream and likes directly into VOX. YouTube source: ‚Ä¢ Press CMD+U and paste any link from YouTube to play it in VOX. You can add it to VOX collections as well. Last.fm: ‚Ä¢ Scrobbling for your music stream; Radio access for VOX Premium subscribers (**NEW**): ‚Ä¢ 30'000+ Radio stations categorized by genres and countries!¬† Equip yourself with all of the audiophile tools of VOX Premium: ‚Ä¢ Advanced Audio Features: HOG Mode; Improved multi-output device support; ‚Ä¢ Convert stereophonic audio in your headphones to binaural using Bauer DSP (BS2B) technology; ‚Ä¢ Automatically Pause playback on headphones disconnection; ‚Ä¢ Take full advantage of AirPlay (10.8+) to listen with any of your wireless output devices. ‚Ä¢ VOX also supports SONOS wireless speakers systems. The beauty of VOX Player is in its simplicity, yet behind the minimal exterior lies a powerful Music Player with a ton of features and support for all audio formats you may ever need.¬† ‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì VOX Premium is available by auto-renewable subscriptions: - $4.99 per month; - $49.99 per year. entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipÔºö$11.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsÔºö - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

entry.title: VOX: MP3 & FLAC Music Player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • VOX Premium SubscriptionÔºö$49.99 ‚Üí $15.99 [$15.99 ~ $49.99]

Application Description

#1 Hi-Res audio player for Mac & iPhone. Music just sounds better! *NEW* Introducing VOX Premium ‚Äì Your Ultimate Music Experience. VOX Premium adds a stunning cloud streaming features and unlimited music storage without a decline in quality. Sync, stream and cache your entire music library on Mac and iPhone in a way that suits you best! Listen to your music regardless of the format: ‚Ä¢ Play numerous lossy and lossless (FLAC, APE, WAV, DSD, etc.) audio formats; ‚Ä¢ Export playlists in various formats (PLS, M3U, XSPF); ‚Ä¢ Open different playlist types including M3U, PLS, XSPF, and the popular CUE format used to store CD rips; ‚Ä¢ Play audio files stored on NAS devices and other network drives. Manage your music easily:¬† ‚Ä¢ Control the player from the main interface, Dock context menu or main menu controls; ‚Ä¢ Automatically search for all the missing album artwork from MusicBrainz and Last.fm databases; ‚Ä¢ Use keyboard media keys, headphones controls, and Apple Remote to control the playback (requires VOX Preference Pane); ‚Ä¢ Easily add music via smart drop zones, open dialog and Finder context menu; ‚Ä¢ Use the Equalizer with presets & custom mode, crossfade, fade on play/pause, converting music to 5.1 or 7.1 format; ‚Ä¢ Preview album artwork from your Dock icon; ‚Ä¢ Gapless playback support; ‚Ä¢ Get system or Growl playback notifications. Focus on music, not the source:¬† ‚Ä¢ Work with different audio sources including custom Playlists, iTunes Library, online radio and much more; ‚Ä¢ Scrobble to Last.fm to keep your listening stats up-to-date; ‚Ä¢ Play any song, any playlist you find on YouTube via VOX FLAC Player, put all your YouTube songs into one media collection. Full SoundCloud integration: ‚Ä¢ Easily control SoundCloud via VOX; ‚Ä¢ Access the largest music database in the world and discover new tunes; ‚Ä¢ Bring your SoundCloud stream and likes directly into VOX. YouTube source: ‚Ä¢ Press CMD+U and paste any link from YouTube to play it in VOX. You can add it to VOX collections as well. Last.fm: ‚Ä¢ Scrobbling for your music stream; Radio access for VOX Premium subscribers (**NEW**): ‚Ä¢ 30'000+ Radio stations categorized by genres and countries!¬† Equip yourself with all of the audiophile tools of VOX Premium: ‚Ä¢ Advanced Audio Features: HOG Mode; Improved multi-output device support; ‚Ä¢ Convert stereophonic audio in your headphones to binaural using Bauer DSP (BS2B) technology; ‚Ä¢ Automatically Pause playback on headphones disconnection; ‚Ä¢ Take full advantage of AirPlay (10.8+) to listen with any of your wireless output devices. ‚Ä¢ VOX also supports SONOS wireless speakers systems. The beauty of VOX Player is in its simplicity, yet behind the minimal exterior lies a powerful Music Player with a ton of features and support for all audio formats you may ever need.¬† ‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì VOX Premium is available by auto-renewable subscriptions: - $4.99 per month; - $49.99 per year. Your credit card will be charged through your iTunes Account after the purchase confirmation. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.¬† Your subscriptions can be managed in your iTunes Account Settings after purchase is made. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. VOX Premium privacy policy:¬†https://vox.rocks/privacy VOX Premium terms and conditions:¬†https://vox.rocks/terms P.S.: FLAC Player, ALAC Player, Lossless Player, SoundCloud Stream Solution, YouTube MP3 Music, Hi-Res audio Player - check all of them in one VOX Music Player.
